definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: highest part, centre (acc. to LXX Vulgate navel, so NH id., and [[טִיבּוּר]], Aram. [[טִיבּוּרָא]], [[טִיבּוּרְיׇא]])—[[הִנֵּה עָם יׁרְדִים מֵעִם טַבּוּר הארץ]] Ju Jdg 9:37 behold people descending from the highest part of the land; [[ישְׁבֵי עַל־טַבּוּר הארץ]] Ez Eze 38:12 those dwelling upon the navel of the earth, i.e. upon the mountainous country of Israel, central and prominent in the earth.
